docs.title: 📘 Overview
docs.text: This project is a simple calculator implemented in Node.js. It performs basic arithmetic operations and is tested with Jest. The entire build, test, and deployment process is automated using Jenkins and GitHub Actions.

docs.title: ⚙️ Functions
docs.text: Function Description Example add(a,b) Returns the sum of a and b add(3,2) → 5 subtract(a,b) Returns the difference subtract(5,2) → 3 multiply(a,b) Returns the product multiply(3,2) → 6 divide(a,b) Returns the quotient (error if b=0) divide(6,3) → 2 modulus(a,b) Returns the remainder modulus(7,3) → 1

docs.title: 🧪 Testing
docs.text: Run all tests locally using: ```bash npm test

docs.title: Test Page
docs.text: This is a test page to check GitHub Pages deployment.

docs.title: My New Documentation Page
docs.text: Welcome to the new documentation page for Heavens Above. This page will help you understand how to contribute, navigate, and use the project effectively.

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: This project is a demonstration of deploying documentation using MkDocs and GitHub Pages. It is designed to be easy to navigate and maintain.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
To run this project locally:

```bash git clone https://github.com/nishazafran/heavens-above.git cd heavens-above pip install mkdocs mkdocs-material mkdocs-awesome-pages-plugin mkdocs serve

docs.title: New Page
docs.text:
Welcome to the new documentation page!

  • This page will be automatically deployed.
  • The workflow will print its URL in GitHub Actions logs. Trigger workflow hellohello

docs.title: Test Page
docs.text: This is a new test page to verify that GitHub Pages deployment works.
